Html:
Hello,

I am using MVVM with MEF and Prism 4 in my application. My problem is when I navigate from one VM to another VM (say Listing to Detail view), I capture the recordID in Listing VM and Navigate to Detail VM through RegionManager.RequestNavigate method.

Then I get the record ID in Detail VM through  OnNavigatedTo(NavigationContext navigationContext) method. Till now everything is fine.

Then I get Details of this record from WCF Service and bind the Properties of VM which are bound to textboxes on View with twoway binding. But here I am not able to see anything.

 

Please help.

Thank & Regards,

Mohit

Hi Mohit,

It would be helpful if you could provide us with a repro sample portraying this problem, so we can help you find out what could be causing it.

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
